snippet: The old Occoneechee-Orange Speedway in Hillsborough, N.C., which hosted stock-car racing royalty during Nascar's first two decades, has been restored and transformed into a public park.
abstract: The old Occoneechee-Orange Speedway in Hillsborough, N.C., which hosted stock-car racing royalty during Nascar's first two decades, has been restored and transformed into a public park.

headline.main: A Relic From Racing's Early Years, Repurposed

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
